text:
Yervand Manaryan (; 20 September 1924 – 19 February 2020) was an Iranian-born Armenian actor. He was born in Arak. Manaryan's acting credits include "Karine" (1969), "Morgan's Relative" (1970), "Chaos" (1974), "A Bride from the North" (1975), "Priekhali na konkurs povara..." (1977), "Arevik" (1978), "Captain Arakel" (1986), "Comrade Panjuni" (1992), "Le piano" (2011) and "Garegin Nzhdeh" (2013).
Manaryan died on 19 February 2020 in Yerevan. He was 95.
